Strings.Text: There is no power. \nIt won't operate.{pause}
The Anti-Satellite is now ready. \nYou can operate the {pause}{clear}Anti-Satellite from the main \ncontrol panel.{pause}

It's the emergency control 
terminal to connect the {pause}{clear}communication line to the 
Anti-Satellite.{pause}{clear}Will you operate the control 
terminal?{0x3000}
The communication line has \nalready been connected. {pause}{clear}You still need to set the target.{pause}
There is no power. \nIt won't operate.{pause}
The target has been set. {pause}{clear}Use the main control panel to \noperate the Anti-Satellite.{pause}
It is the control panel to set the \ntarget. Target has been set for {pause}{clear}the gigantic dinosaur.{pause}{clear}Will you send the data to the \nsatellite?{0x3000}
The communication line with the \nAnti-Satellite is not connected. {pause}{clear}The target data cannot be sent to \nthe satellite.{pause}
There is no power. \nIt won't operate.{pause}
It is the control panel to \ncommand the Anti-Satellite. {pause}{clear}To start it, you need to open the \ncommunication line and set the {pause}{clear}target.{pause}
The Emergency Defense System \nis activated and the emergency {pause}{clear}shutter is closed.{pause}
